bibl.title: Soldier and Civilian in Byzantine Hermopolis.
bibl.note: Between the years 340 and 538, the city of Hermopolis was garrisoned by a military unit, known as the Equites Mauri Scutarii. Despite the unit's 'barbaric' title, the Moors were recruited from the local population. Refers to the dossier of Flavius Isidorus, to the Taurinus archive and to the dossier of the family of Flavius Silvanus.
